body:
## PR description:

Minor changes to the dd4hep code to make meaningful comparison with DDD version

#### PR validation:

Use the python scripts in Geometry/HcalAlgo/test/python directory

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hcx245 Make minor changes to HB geometry in dd4hep algorithm to make meaningful comparison with DDD version
